long_description: With an oversize zip-up neck to keep you warm during runs in cold weather, the Brooks Glycerin II Jacket for women uses moisture-wicking fabric with 4-way stretch to fend off the workout chills. The Brooks Glycerin II Jacket for women features a versatile, oversize collar that roll downs to fit like a half-zip. Side zip pockets and internal moisture-proof media pocket. Thumbholes; slim fit; 360deg of reflectivity.
short_description: With an oversize zip-up neck to keep you warm during runs in cold weather, the Brooks Glycerin II Jacket for women uses moisture-wicking fabric with 4-way stretch to fend off the workout chills.
